casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Allen COOK. No. 272P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Karen A. Blum, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State. James Allen Cook, Bunn, for Cook, James Allen. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2015 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
